message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You got lucky this round, but I'll get my revenge soon!
I'll give you a better deal this time, but don't think you're getting away that easily!
You're getting desperate, I can see it!
I'll give you a slightly better deal, but don't think you're getting away with everything!
You're running out of time, and I'm running out of patience!
I'll give you a slightly better deal, but I'm not going down without a fight!
You're getting close to the edge, and I'm going to push you off!
I'll give you a small chance to show mercy, but don't think it's a generous offer!
You're almost out of time, and I'm going to take what's mine!
I'll give you the last shred of hope, but don't think it's a generous offer!
You've had your chance, now it's my turn to take the last crumbs!
